application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Condition 7 (Details of Fixed Windows), 8 (Noise Attenuation Measures) and 9 (Mechanical Ventilation System) of planning permission 22/00580/FUL (Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 to carry out development without compliance with Condition 1 (Approved plans) of Planning Permission 21/03278/FUL (Erection of two storey side and rear extension to create 1no. three-bedroom dwelling.) to allow for, amendment to shop fenestration, installation of additional roof lights, increase of rear extension by 1m and amendment to roof)
decision_conditions: The details for Condition 7 (Details of Fixed Windows) contain conflicting information regarding whether the windows would be fixed shut or openable, and therefore this condition cannot be discharged.
No details have been provided for Condition 8 (Noise Attenuation Measures) and therefore the condition cannot be discharged.
